00053 #define UTF_ERROR_NULL_IN 1 << 0 /* Error occures when requered parameter is missing*/
00054 #define UTF_ERROR_ILLCHAR 1 << 1 /* Error if character is in illigal UTF rage*/
00055 #define UTF_ERROR_SMALL   1 << 2 /* Passed size is to small. It gives legal string with character missing at the end*/
00056 #define UTF_ERROR_ILLSEQ  1 << 3 /* Error if sequence is broken and doesn't finish*/

00091 wchar_t *alloc_utf16_from_8(const char *in8, size_t add);
00092 
00093 /* Easy allocation and conversion of new utf-16 string. New string has _16 suffix. Must be deallocated with UTF16_UN_ENCODE in right order*/
00094 #define UTF16_ENCODE(in8str) if (1) { \
00095         wchar_t *in8str ## _16 = alloc_utf16_from_8((char *)in8str, 0)
00096 
00097 #define UTF16_UN_ENCODE(in8str) \
00098     free(in8str ## _16); } (void)0
